column3:
Image-ID if this is an observation of an image
NA if it is a human observation
column4:
For plates. 
NA if not a plate. T=Top, B=bottom, number  = plate number counting from the baseplate upwards
column5:
Very brief note about the identified object. 
NA if there are no notes
column6:
"plate image" is an observation of an image of an ARMS plate
"field image" is an observation of any other image - whether take in-situ, in the boat, in the lab...
"plate observation" is a human observation of a plate (the real plate, not the image) 
"field observation" is a human observation of anything else - in-situ, boat, lab... (again, the real thing, not the image)
column8: Please do not use circumflexes, umlauts, or any accent. If copy-pasting, do so "without format".
column13: For longer comments you wish to make
